from abc import ABC, abstractmethod

# ðŸ”¹ Interface for inserting items into the tree


[docs]
class ITreeInsert(ABC):


[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def insert_item(self, parent_path: str, item_definition: dict):
        pass





# ðŸ”¹ Interface for moving items in the tree


[docs]
class ITreeMove(ABC):


[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def move_item(self, source: str, destination: str):
        pass





# ðŸ”¹ Interface for removing items from the tree


[docs]
class ITreeRemove(ABC):


[docs]
    @abstractmethod
    def remove_item(self, item_path: str):
        pass
